recipes.title: Spaghetti with garlic, chilli and parsley
Shepard's Pie
ingredients: 10g dried ceps (porcini) mushrooms, ground into a powder (I blitz them in a coffee grinder)
200g cherry tomatoes, blitzed to a liquid
1 sprig each of thyme and rosemary

recipes.title: Bolognese ragu sauce
ingredients: 750g ground beef – if possible, ask your butcher for beef neck or flank with a wide grind
250g cherry tomatoes, blitzed in a blender

recipes.title: Five-spice chicken and vegetable stir-fry
ingredients: 2 x 150g chicken breasts, cut into small pieces
2cm piece of fresh ginger, peeled and cut into matchsticks
1 red and 1 yellow pepper, deseeded and cut into strips
½ small head of broccoli, broken into little florets

recipes.title: Pho ga chicken noodle soup with crispy chicken skin
ingredients: 4 chicken thighs, skin on and bone in
500ml chicken stock (home-made, or it’s worth splashing out on a carton from the chiller cabinet if you can)
2 tsp Vietnamese or Thai fish sauce
50g rice noodles (dried, not ready to eat)
Fresh mint, coriander, and lime wedges to serve

recipes.title: American pancakes with honey-roasted pear, walnut, and vanilla ice cream
ingredients: A pinch of sea salt flakes
